SELECT t.*, y.category_name, ut.`name` as unit_name, d.brand_name, e.discount_rate, e.retail_price, e.wholesale_price, e.membership_price, COALESCE(k.stock_count, 0) + COALESCE(pk.stock_count, 0) as stock_count FROM gr_product t LEFT JOIN (SELECT de.* from gr_product_barcode de,gr_unit ut WHERE de.unit_id = ut.id and ut.type = 0 ) e ON t.id = e.product_id AND e.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_contactunits r ON t.default_contactunits_id = r.id AND r.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_brand d ON t.brand_id = d.id AND d.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_product_category y ON y.id = t.category_id AND y.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gr_unit ut ON ut.id = t.unit_id AND ut.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN (select sum(sk.stock_count) stock_count, sk.product_id from gr_current_stock sk where sk.deleted = 0
and sk.store_id IN
#{id}
group by sk.product_id) k ON k.product_id = t.id LEFT JOIN (select sum(gpk.stock_count) stock_count, gpk.product_id from gr_product_stock gpk where gpk.deleted = 0
and gpk.store_id IN
#{id}
group by gpk.product_id) pk ON pk.product_id = t.id WHERE t.deleted = 0
and (t.number like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or t.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or e.barcode like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or t.specs like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or r.contactunits_name like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') or d.brand_name like CONCAT('%', #{param}, '%') )
